mapper.select: select tc.clue_id,tc.name,tch.channel_name,tc.phone,tc.status,tc.create_time,tc.create_by,ta.user_name as owner,tc.next_time from tienchin_clue tc left join tienchin_channel tch on tc.channel_id = tch.channel_id and tch.del_flag = 0 left join tienchin_assignment ta on tc.clue_id = ta.assign_id and ta.latest = true
